mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.yiyuanxinxi_name as yiyuanxinxiName ,a.yiyuanxinxi_types as yiyuanxinxiTypes ,a.yiyuanxinxi_phone as yiyuanxinxiPhone ,a.address_types as addressTypes ,a.yiyuanxinxi_photo as yiyuanxinxiPhoto ,a.yiyuanxinxi_content as yiyuanxinxiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yiyuanxinxi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.yiyuanxinxi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yiyuanxinxiName},'%')
and a.yiyuanxinxi_types = #{params.yiyuanxinxiTypes}
and a.yiyuanxinxi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yiyuanxinxiPhone},'%')
and a.address_types = #{params.addressTypes}
and a.yiyuanxinxi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yiyuanxinxiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
